website_summaries.verdict: Though not as in-depth or comprehensive as some prep books, choose it if you want to simulate the property and casualty exam before the big day.
pros: Practice taking your test before your grade matters with these practice questions from Mometrix
cons: Lacks information compared to others we reviewed, considering it has only 72 pages
Some of the answers to the sample questions lack detail

customer_reviews.title: The format how to understand and answer questions
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited that I read it all in my first convenience. I felt that material contained in this book is really genuine and beneficial to every one who wishes to take this exam. I'm confident that I can pass the exam in my first attempt. it has covered all aspects of insurance field as far as property and casualty is concerned.Thank you for taking pains in compiling and publishing this useful and comprehensive book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this company.  Easy to follow and interesting.
customer_reviews.text: Material is easy to follow and interesting. I found Mometrix easy to follow and did not feel frustrated learning. When comparing to PSI Exam Scheduler, Mometrix is so much better. It is not easy to learn and boring.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Grace

customer_reviews.title: "Passed my property and casualty exam"
customer_reviews.text: I used this book as additional help and it worked. I passed my property and casualty exam yesterday (12/21/2019) for the state of Georgia.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey M. Hood

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and simplicity to understand the subject matter in the guide.
customer_reviews.text: This Guide is amazing. I received it in no time from the seller and it makes easy to understand and know what to expect at the test center.
customer_reviews.author: Hilaire

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Book
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is very helpful with the test questions that are mostly on the test this gives you a fantastic idea how to read the whole question, I am very pleased with what I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Easery to remeber
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it's geared to so many sample questions. It allow me to study and understand insurance better without all the verbiage in between. I don't have to make study que cards now since the study book is directly to the point.
customer_reviews.author: Hands of Love & Caring Hearts Inc

customer_reviews.title: Practicle questions
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommended this product because those questions are very practical. They really help me to understand the concepts of each topics inside the book.
customer_reviews.author: YuanHang Liu

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding study material!!!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this book has great questions and is very helpful in preparing me for the Property Casualty Insurance Exam that I am going to take this week. I love how each answer is explained!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this book. It's help a lots when I study for my upcoming exam.

customer_reviews.title: It has very good questions along with excellent
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Property & Casualty Exam Practice Questions from Amazon.It has very good questions along with excellent, logical explanations of the correct answers.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Stratchko

customer_reviews.title: Passing Property and Casualty Test
customer_reviews.text: This book has been very helpful in understanding Property and Casualty. Questions are very well explain and so far I am loving and enjoying this book

customer_reviews.title: ... been really straight forward to use and I really like the answer explanations that help me understand why the ...
customer_reviews.text: It has been really straight forward to use and I really like the answer explanations that help me understand why the answer is the one that it is. It really takes the complications out of studying.

customer_reviews.title: Read, Read!! It should work!!
customer_reviews.text: Hopeful that this will help to pass my test, nothing else has worked!!

customer_reviews.text: A. This study guide has great information as to why the answer to the question is the right answer. This should help me tremendously score a high score on my P&C test.

customer_reviews.title: I really liked that the answers to each question were explained
customer_reviews.text: cgreat study book, a lot of Info and explanations... I really liked that the answers to each question were explained.

customer_reviews.title: Practicing taking Exam questions is the best way to passing for the real exam
customer_reviews.text: Practicing taking Exam questions is the best way to passing for the real exam. I feel this book will help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Company and Study Material
customer_reviews.text: It was great and definitely helped me pass my exam. The book gave me several practice tests and made it easy to understand and I would recommend this product to anyone that needs help. The shipping was super fast!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Reifsnyder

customer_reviews.title: 2 Practice Exams and Bad Explanations - Don't waste your money on this bad product.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the worst product you could possibly buy. It has a a TOTAL of 2 practice exams and the explanations of the correct answers are pretty much worthless. The answers only give you the correct answer for the answer but not why or why the others are wrong. Additionally, I work in the insurance field and some of the answers they give you I can tell you right now are wrong. A terrible price for such a thin, weak, measly product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mailich Oosher

customer_reviews.title: THIS BOOK IS A MUST HAVE !!️!!️!!️
customer_reviews.text: Listen !! This book is AMAZING. I passed my test on the 1st try and I was on the struggle bus ( LOL trust me) . Excellent format & explanations . It truly prepared me & made me feel more confident
customer_reviews.author: Ashland Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great study tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love both of these because I’m able to apply what I have read in a concise way. It helps me study better. I’ve always done better with flash cards. I love how the answers are on the back. I don’t have to go searching in the book for the correct answer.
customer_reviews.author: Fohnta Chea Slater

customer_reviews.title: I will use these as good study material and do the practice exams before I ...
customer_reviews.text: All of these products are very helpful in addition to a class I took. I will use these as good study material and do the practice exams before I take the state exam. I like that the practice questions have the answers with explanations. The flash cards will be another way to review the information and the Secrets Study Guide is outlined very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Concise Study Guide
customer_reviews.text: Great if the questions are similar to those on the test. I found it extremely helpful in real life situations and comparisons.
customer_reviews.author: Karan

customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THIS MATERIAL I DO FEEL LIKE IT HELPED BUT I WISH I HAD SOMETHING TO REGENERATE QUESTIONS IN ORDER TO BENEFIT ME MORE IN STUDYING. BUT OVER-ALL IT IS A GOOD STUDY TOOL

customer_reviews.text: I believe this resource will be of big help in the outcome of my testing!
